content: We generated $74 million of discretionary cash flow in the second quarter, which means we are delivering $44 million or $0.56 per share to our shareholders for the variable dividend on top of the fixed dividend of $0.06 per share. Since going public in July 2018 and inclusive of the $0.62 per share dividend that will be paid in August we will have returned more than 225 million to shareholders in the form of dividends and share repurchases, which is more than 2x the 110 million of net IPO proceeds.
